name: Chip Off The Ol' Stumbling Block (DEMO)
name_original: Chip Off The Ol' Stumbling Block (DEMO)
description:
My first tutorial from a decade ago becomes my first game!

Chip Off The Ol' Stumbling Block is a fast-paced, not-endless runner where you dodge some obstacles and use others to make your way to the end!

6/23 Update: Fixed the early game to make it easier.
